hero.desc: D2MBox is a powerful data storage platform, offering high-speed uploads/downloads with no storage limits. Flexible permission system helps teams and businesses manage efficiently, while ensuring absolute data safety with various sharing modes. Built on Google infrastructure, D2MBox provides an intuitive interface and convenient, easy-to-use file management tools.
hero.desc_1: Not just storage, D2MBox also integrates advanced AI tools: automatic video upload and processing, multi-language subtitle extraction ‚Äì translation ‚Äì synchronization, media content merging, global AI voice conversion,... All streamlined in an intuitive interface, running smoothly on all platforms.
hero.desc_2: Built on Google's powerful infrastructure and enhanced with AI tecsidebarhnology, D2MBox is not just a storage place ‚Äì but a smart data processing & operations center of the future.

description.title: SMART USER PERMISSIONS
description.feature_1_desc: Create and manage users in your group without going through a central system.
description.feature_2_desc: Members share storage, actions are just a few clicks away.
description.feature_3_desc: Build a tree-structured permission model, each leader is a 'mini admin' of their own system.
description.feature_4_desc: You have full control over your team ‚Äì like a separate system within a larger system.
description.sync_desc: With just a few simple steps, you can easily upload any file from your device to the system. All data is securely stored, instantly synchronized and ready to access anytime, anywhere ‚Äì fast, convenient and with maximum security.
description.share_title: Comprehensive support, handle media content in just a few steps
description.share_desc: Integrating a powerful AI toolkit makes working with video and language easier than ever: From downloading movies, joining videos, getting and adjusting subtitles, to automatic multilingual translation and AI voiceover. Everything is fast, accurate, and optimized for post-production, media, or cross-platform learning.
description.ui_title: Intuitive, user-friendly ‚Äì works in a snap
description.ui_desc: The interface is designed to be minimalistic yet sophisticated, making it easy for users to get acquainted and operate right from the first use. Every management process ‚Äì from file organization to user control ‚Äì becomes seamless, saving time and improving work efficiency.

faq.title: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
faq.1_a: We use modern encryption technology and manual verification to ensure your data is always maximally protected from unauthorized access.
faq.2_q: 2. Can I upgrade/downgrade my plan at any time?
faq.2_a: You can change your plan at any time with just a few simple steps in your account management page.
faq.3_q: 3. How do I pay? Do you provide invoices?
faq.3_a: We support various payment methods (bank transfer, e-wallet, etc.). VAT invoices will be sent to you after successful payment.
faq.4_q: 4. Will I get quick support if I have problems?
faq.4_a: Our support team is always available 24/7 via email, phone, fanpage, and online chat channels.
faq.5_a: You can contact us for advice on upgrading storage to suit your needs.

cta.title: Grow your team's work with
cta.desc: D2MBox is a smart storage and collaboration platform that helps teams and businesses operate efficiently, securely and flexibly. Whether you are a small startup or a growing company, D2MBox provides a secure storage space combined with a powerful authorization system, task creation, work division and direct exchange right on the web. In addition, the platform also integrates a versatile AI Toolkit that supports movie downloading, video merging, subtitle extraction and translation, multilingual voiceover - all helping you shorten processing time and improve work efficiency. Easy management, smooth operation, transparency and professionalism - all ready to help your team accelerate.

footer.description: Cloud computing encryption service for the community

hero.title: Explore mission and core values
hero.subtitle: D2MBox is not only a storage platform, but also a comprehensive solution for secure, flexible and efficient data sharing and management. With the mission of accompanying modern businesses and individuals, D2MBox brings a smooth experience, optimizes work and connects smart collaboration in the digital age.

security.title: Absolute Security
security.desc: Encrypted data, multi-layer protection, absolute safety commitment.

storage.title: Flexible Storage
storage.desc: Google Drive integration, unlimited expansion, multi-platform sync.

team.title: Smart Team Management
team.desc: Tree-structured permissions, leaders manage members independently, internal security.

speed.title: Outstanding Speed
speed.desc: Fast upload/download, smooth operations, optimized for businesses.

partner.title: D2MBox ‚Äì A reliable companion at work

goals.title: D2MBox Goals & Commitments
goals.item_1: Providing flexible, highly secure storage platform, meeting the needs of individuals and businesses
goals.item_2: Ensure absolute privacy, detailed access control by authorization
goals.item_3: Accompanying businesses on the journey of effective and modern digital transformation
goals.item_4: Integrated smart AI Toolkit supports video processing, subtitles, translation and multilingual voiceover
goals.item_5: Dedicated, professional 24/7 customer service ‚Äì always available when you need it

integration.title: Comprehensive integration expansion
integration.desc: Flexible connectivity with cloud platforms, APIs, and enterprise management systems. D2MBox aims to become a digital data coordination center - where all processes, tools, and platforms are intelligently synchronized for large-scale enterprises.

ai.title: AI & Intelligent Automation
ai.desc: Integrate advanced AI tools to automate data management, retrieval, and security processes. From language translation, subtitling, voice transcription, to video content analysis ‚Äì everything becomes fast, accurate, and resource-efficient.

platform.title: Seamless cross-platform experience
platform.desc: D2MBox is designed to work seamlessly on any device ‚Äì from web browsers, mobile apps, desktops to IoT systems. Wherever you work, your data and tools are always at your fingertips.

cta.title: Ready to experience D2MBox?
cta.subtitle: Register an account now to receive offers and explore all our amazing features!

create_video.title: Create New Video
create_video.description: Click this button to create a new video project. You can choose from an empty canvas or popular aspect ratios like 16:9, 9:16, 1:1.

search.description: Type keywords in the search box to quickly find the project you need. The system will search by project name.

timeline.title: Timeline

faqs.a: D2MBox is a modern cloud storage platform that helps you store, sync, and share personal and business data safely, securely, and conveniently. You can access your data anytime, anywhere, on any device with just one account. D2MBox is suitable for individuals, workgroups, and businesses who want to optimize digital data management.

We apply multiple layers of security: data encryption during transmission and storage, strict access control, multi-factor authentication (2FA), and regular security testing. Only you and those you authorize can access your data. D2MBox commits not to share personal data with third parties without your consent.

faqs.q: What devices can I access my data from?
faqs.a: You can access D2MBox from computers, phones, tablets through the website or app (if available). Data is synchronized instantly across all devices. For example: you upload a file from your phone, you can open it immediately on your laptop without additional operations.

faqs.q: How do I recover my password if I forget it?
faqs.a: You just need to click 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your registered email. The system will send a verification code to your email, you enter this code and set a new password. If you encounter difficulties, contact the support team for quick assistance.

faqs.q: Does D2MBox support sharing files with people outside the system?
faqs.a: Yes. You can create share links for files/folders to anyone, including people without D2MBox accounts. You can set passwords, expiration times, or only allow viewing without downloading to control access rights.

faqs.q: Can I upgrade or downgrade my service plan?
faqs.a: You can upgrade/downgrade your plan at any time in the account management section. Balance or duration will be automatically calculated according to D2MBox policy. If you need advice on suitable plans, contact the support team for detailed answers.
We use reputable payment gateways, encrypt transactions, and do not store your card information on the system. All transactions are confirmed via email or SMS to ensure absolute safety for users.

You can contact us via email contact-d2m@dammeviet.vn, hotline +84 911 930 807 or send support requests directly on the website. Our support team is always ready to answer all questions and handle incidents 24/7.

You can recover deleted files within the temporary storage period (Recycle Bin, usually 15-30 days). After this period, data will be permanently deleted from the system and cannot be recovered. Please check carefully before deleting important data.

faqs.q: Can I use D2MBox for business?
faqs.a: D2MBox provides specialized service packages and features for businesses: group management, detailed permissions, usage reports, API integration, private deployment support. Contact us to receive advice on the most suitable solution for your business.

contact.title: Contact & Support
contact.subtitle: If you need support, consultation, or have any questions about D2MBox, please contact us through the channels below or send a request directly via the form.
contact.support_content_placeholder: Describe the issue you need support for...

intro.p1: When using D2MBox services, you agree to comply with the terms below. These terms are designed to ensure the rights, obligations, and responsibilities of both users and service providers. Please read carefully before using.
intro.p2: These terms apply to all users who access, register, or use any D2MBox product, service, website, or application.

list: You must provide accurate, complete information when registering an account.
Do not use the service for illegal purposes, distributing harmful content, spam, fraud, or cyber attacks.
You are responsible for securing login information and not sharing your account with others.
Notify D2MBox immediately when you detect unauthorized access or suspect account information leakage.
register.example: Example: Do not use the service to store/distribute malware, copyright-infringing content, or prohibited materials.

list: When using Google login features or connecting Google Drive, you agree to allow D2MBox to access information and files within the scope of permissions you have confirmed with Google.
You have the right to control and revoke this access at any time through your Google account management page.
D2MBox commits to only use your Google data to provide announced features, not for advertising purposes or sharing with third parties.
You are responsible for the content of uploaded data, ensuring no violation of intellectual property rights or laws.
D2MBox commits to protect your data according to the highest security standards, but is not responsible for data content.
You have the right to export and delete data at any time. D2MBox will completely delete data when you request.

user_rights.rights: Rights: Access and use services according to registered packages, receive technical support, data security.
user_rights.obligations: Obligations: Comply with terms, not violate laws, secure account information, pay in full.
user_rights.limitations: Limitations: Do not use the service for illegal purposes or harm the system or other users.

provider_rights.rights: Rights: Suspend/block violating accounts, change services, collect fees according to agreed packages.
provider_rights.responsibilities: Responsibilities: Provide stable services, secure data, technical support, warranty according to commitments.
provider_rights.limitations: Limitations: Not responsible for data content, user errors, incidents beyond control.

list: Payment is made before using services according to the selected package.
Refunds only apply when D2MBox cannot provide services according to commitments.
No refunds for users voluntarily canceling services or violating terms.
All payment transactions are recorded and invoices issued according to regulations.

suspend.suspend: Suspension: When violations are detected, wait for verification and processing according to regulations.
suspend.terminate: Termination: When serious violations occur, not remedied after warnings, or user requests.
suspend.data_deletion: After termination, data will be permanently deleted within 30 days.
suspend.export: Users can export data before service termination.

list: D2MBox is not responsible for data loss due to technical errors, natural disasters, or network incidents.
Maximum compensation responsibility does not exceed the amount paid in the last 12 months.
Not responsible for indirect damages, lost profits, or lost data.
Users bear risks when using services and need to backup important data.
D2MBox has the right to change these terms when necessary to improve services or comply with laws.
Change notifications will be sent via email or posted on the website at least 30 days before taking effect.
Continuing to use services after changes take effect is considered agreement with new terms.
If you disagree with changes, you have the right to cancel services and export data before changes take effect.

contact.p1: If you have questions about these terms, please contact us:
list: Email: contact-d2m@dammeviet.vn
Address: 205 Binh Duc 5, Binh Duc Ward, An Giang
contact.effective: These terms are effective from 22/07/2025 and replace all previous terms.

introduction.p1: D2MBox is committed to protecting your privacy and personal data when using our cloud storage service. This policy explains in detail how we collect, use, store, share, and protect your information. Using our service means you agree to the terms in this policy. We encourage you to read carefully and regularly update on changes.
introduction.p2: This policy applies to all users who access, register, or use any D2MBox service, product, website, or application, including both individual and business customers.

collect.p1: We collect the following types of information to provide, operate, protect, and improve our service:
list: Personal Information (Personal Data)
Non-Personal Information (Non-Personal Data)
Cookies & Similar Technologies

personal.p1: We collect personally identifiable information that you provide directly when registering an account, using our service, contacting support, or participating in promotional programs. Examples include:
list: Full name, email, phone number, contact address.
Login information (username, encrypted password).
Data stored on our system (files, folders, related metadata).
Transaction history, invoices, payment information (if using paid services).
Content of communications with support, feedback, reviews.
Additional verification information (ID card, business license) if required for business accounts.
personal.example: Real example: When you register an account, we require email and phone number for verification and account security support. When you contact support, we save communication content to improve our service.

nonpersonal.p1: We automatically collect some non-personally identifiable information when you visit our website or use our application, including:
list: IP address, device type, operating system, browser, screen resolution.
Access time, pages viewed, links clicked, referral source.
Anonymous statistical data about usage behavior, system performance.
Geographic location information (if you allow).
nonpersonal.note: Note: This information helps us analyze, optimize performance, detect errors, protect the system from unauthorized access, and enhance user experience.

cookies.p1: We use cookies, web beacons, and similar technologies to:
list: Remember login information, personalize interface preferences.
Analyze traffic, measure marketing campaign effectiveness.
Support security, detect unusual behavior.
cookies.p2: You can customize your browser to reject or delete cookies, however some features may not work optimally if cookies are disabled.

googleapi.p1: We use Google services, including Google Drive API, to provide features such as storing, retrieving, and managing your files on Google Drive. When you log in or connect your Google account to D2MBox, we may collect and process the following information (depending on the permissions you grant):
list: Basic Google profile information (name, email, profile picture).
List of files and folders on your Google Drive.
File content (only when you perform upload, download, or preview operations).
Information about file access permissions and sharing.
commitment_list: Only access and use Google Drive data when you have given clear permission.
Not share, sell, or use your Google Drive data for purposes outside the scope of our service.
Encrypt data retrieved from Google API during transmission and storage.
You can disconnect your Google account at any time, and we will delete related access tokens from our system.
We comply with Google API Services User Data Policy, including requirements for usage limits and data security.
googleapi.policy_link: Google API Services User Data Policy

list: Provide, maintain, develop, and personalize service for each user.
Manage accounts, authentication, customer support, process requests and responses.
Send notifications, updates, promotions, newsletters (if you subscribe).
Analyze, statistics, market research, improve products.
Detect, prevent fraud, protect system and user security.
Comply with legal regulations, resolve disputes, handle complaints.
use.example: Example: We use your email to send notifications about service changes, login verification, or support when you forget your password.

list: We do not sell, exchange, or share personal information with third parties for commercial purposes without your consent.
May share with technical partners, payment service providers, storage, security providers, but only within necessary scope and with security commitments.
Share information when there are legal requests from authorities or to protect legitimate interests of D2MBox and users.
Transfer data in case of merger, business acquisition (will notify in advance).
share.example: Example: If you pay through a bank gateway, we will share necessary information with payment partners to process the transaction.

list: Request access, edit, update, or delete personal information at any time.
Withdraw consent for personal data processing (may affect service usage).
Object to using data for marketing purposes.
Receive a copy of personal data (as per legal regulations).
Contact support to exercise these rights.
rights.note: Note: Some requests may require identity verification to ensure your safety.

list: Data is encrypted during transmission and storage on servers located in internationally certified data centers.
Apply physical security measures (access control, cameras, guards), technical (firewall, anti-virus, IDS/IPS), and administrative (internal procedures, staff training).
Regularly inspect, evaluate, update systems to prevent risks and security vulnerabilities.
Limit access to personal data only to necessary personnel.
Collaborate with experts, independent security units for regular testing.
security.breach: In case of data breach: If an incident occurs, we will promptly notify users and authorities as required by regulations.

list: Personal data is stored for the duration you use our service and/or as required by law.
You can request account deletion and personal data at any time (except when law requires retention).
After deletion, data will be removed from main system and backups within reasonable time.
Some non-personal data, anonymous statistics may be retained longer for analysis and service improvement.
storage.example: Example: When you delete your account, all files and personal information will be deleted from the main system within 30 days.

changes.p1: Privacy policy may be updated to comply with legal regulations, new technology, or operational needs. All changes will be announced on our website and/or via email if necessary. Continuing to use our service after policy changes means you accept the new terms.

contact.p1: If you have questions, requests, or complaints related to privacy policy, please contact:
list: Email: contact-d2m@dammeviet.vn
Address: 205 Binh Duc 5, Binh Duc Ward, An Giang
contact.response: We will respond within 3 business days.

intro.p1: This page explains how D2MBox uses cookies and similar technologies to identify you when accessing our website/services. Using our service means you agree to this cookie policy.

what.p1: Cookies are small files stored on your device when you visit a website. Cookies help websites remember information about you (such as login status, preferences, browsing history) to improve your user experience.

list.title: Essential cookies:
list.desc: Help websites function properly (login, security, navigation...)

list.title: Analytics cookies:
list.desc: Collect anonymous data about user behavior to improve services.

list: Remember login information, avoiding the need to re-enter each time you visit.
Store personalization preferences for interface and language.
Analyze, measure website effectiveness, detect errors, optimize experience.
Support security, detect unusual access.
Display advertisements relevant to preferences (if any).

manage.p1: You can customize your browser to reject or delete cookies at any time. However, disabling cookies may affect some website features (e.g., no automatic login, loss of personalization preferences).
list: Cookie management guides are usually found in the Settings section of your browser.
You can also use incognito mode to limit cookie storage.
Right to know, control, delete cookies on your device.
Right to reject cookies not necessary for basic website functionality.
Right to contact D2MBox to inquire about cookie usage.

changes.p1: Cookie policy may be updated to comply with legal regulations or operational needs. All changes will be announced on our website.

list: Email: contact-d2m@dammeviet.vn
Address: 205 Binh Duc 5, Binh Duc Ward, An Giang
contact.response: We will respond within 3 business days.

plan_change_summary.storage_min_error: Minimum storage is 20TB, must be an integer

plan_change_summary.extra_days: Extra days added to the new plan:
plan_change_summary.extra_days_tooltip:
Extra days = (Remaining days of the old plan √ó old plan price/day) divided by new plan price/day.

If the new plan is more expensive, fewer days are converted. If the new plan is cheaper, more days are converted.
plan_change_summary.pro_rata_payment: Payment amount is calculated based on the remaining days (pro-rata)
plan_change_summary.pro_rata_tooltip:
When changing to the same type (month ‚Üí month or year ‚Üí year), payment = (new plan price for the remaining days) minus the remaining value of the old plan.

You only pay the difference when upgrading.
plan_change_summary.cannot_downgrade_title: Cannot downgrade while the current plan still has validity.
plan_change_summary.cannot_downgrade: Please wait until expiry to switch to a lower plan.
plan_change_summary.downgrade_year_to_month_title: Downgrade from yearly to monthly plan:

plan_change_summary.insufficient_value_title: The remaining value of the old plan is insufficient to convert into new plan days.
plan_change_summary.insufficient_value: You will start the new plan without any additional days.
plan_change_summary.upgrade_renew_same_type:

Remaining value: {amount}‚Ç´
New plan price: {newPrice}‚Ç´

Remaining value: {amount}‚Ç´
Yearly plan price: {yearPrice}‚Ç´
